Expected result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.
The Ether balance is shown on the overview. The wallet address is shown on the overview. The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test steps: Keep Ethereum Mainnet as the selected network.
Select or import an account with NFT balance.
Notes: Please request access to this test account from George Balolong (Business Operations).

Preconditions: Make sure the autodetect NFT toggle is OFF in Settings.
Expected result: A prompt is shown to Turn on NFT detection in Settings.
Notes: Note that NFT autodetection is only available on Ethereum Mainnet. The option will not appear in settings if you have a different network selected.

Test steps: Proceed to the Turn on NFT detection in Settings hyperlink.
Expected result: The Security & Privacy Menu opens to Token autodetection.

Notes: Display NFT Media toggle will turn ON automatically at this point.

Test steps: Go back to the NFTs list.
Expected result: The tokens list is updated with all imported tokens.
